sentences.english: Clever beach towels and creative towel designs from all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 以下呈現全球富有創意和設計聰穎的沙灘毛巾。

sentences.english: Thou art as fair in knowledge as in hue.
sentences.chinese: 你有美麗的嬌顏又智慧聰穎。

sentences.english: I see children who have all sorts of talent, and then all of a sudden their grades start to plummet.
sentences.chinese: 我看到一些天資聰穎的孩子成績突然直線下降。

sentences.english: Both Chinese and Indians are endowed with intelligence and a spirit of research.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個國家的人天資聰穎，富有研究精神。

sentences.english: Helen was smart and learned quickly.
sentences.chinese: 海倫天資聰穎，學得很快。

sentences.english: All that CUNY demands is that these students be diligent and clever.
sentences.chinese: 城市大學唯一需要的就是這些學生必須勤奮並且聰穎。

sentences.english: Bright and eager to learn, has promising potential.
sentences.chinese: 聰穎機敏，好學不倦，有優越之學習能力。

definition: to have a highly retentive memory/to have sth imprinted in one's memory
full of political wisdom (idiom)/politically astute/with encyclopedic experience of state policy
cultured and refined (idiom); gentle and cultivated
(in former times) to bind one's hair on coming of age
